description: If you enjoy speedy ascents, these hybrid softshell pants are the perfect choice. These lightweight, stretchy and highly breathable ski pants combine a medium-weight, double-woven softshell material and lightweight storm fleece with waffle structure to protect you from the wind. Various fabrics are used for different zones for optimal function in the right spots. The fabric actively wicks away moisture to ensure the pants are comfortable even when you break a sweat during strenuous activities. Side zippers provide extra ventilation when you need it. Only the bare necessities but still no compromises – the Aenergy is sure to become your go-to for speedy ski touring.
name: Mammut Aenergy SO Hybrid Pants, Short - Mens
